flavorText: Nezumi insect-shamans enjoyed solitary lives, which was fortunate since no other nezumi could stand to live within half a mile of their foul stench.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Insekten-Schamanen der Nezumi mochten die Einsamkeit, was ein Glück war, denn kein anderer Nezumi wollte näher dran als eine halbe Meile an ihrem faulen Gestank wohnen.
foreignData.name: Mückengeizhals
foreignData.text: Die maximale Handkartenzahl aller Gegner ist um 1 reduziert.

foreignData.flavorText: Los chamanes de insectos nezumi disfrutaban de vidas solitarias, lo que era apropiado ya que ningún otro nezumi podía soportar vivir a un kilómetro de su apestoso hedor.
foreignData.name: Ávido de mosquitos
foreignData.text: El tamaño máximo de mano de cada oponente se reduce en uno.

foreignData.flavorText: Les shamanes-insectes nezumi appréciaient une vie solitaire, ce qui valait mieux car aucun nezumi ne supportait leur infâme puanteur.
foreignData.name: Avare aux moucherons
foreignData.text: La taille maximale de la main de chaque adversaire est réduite de un.

foreignData.flavorText: Gli sciamani-insetti nezumi amavano vivere in solitudine, una vera fortuna visto che nessun nezumi avrebbe mai sopportato di vivere a meno di un chilometro dal loro terribile fetore.
foreignData.name: Culice Arraffone
foreignData.text: Il numero massimo di carte che ogni avversario può tenere in mano è ridotto di uno.

foreignData.flavorText: 鼠の蟲使いは一人暮らしを好む。他の鼠はその臭いに半哩と近づけないのだから当然のことだ。
foreignData.name: 虻たかりの守銭奴
foreignData.text: 各対戦相手の手札の最大枚数は１減る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ネズミ・シャーマン

foreignData.flavorText: Os xamãs-insetos nezumis gostavam de viver sozinhos, o que era bom já que nenhum outro nezumi aguentava viver a menos de meia milha de seu mau-cheiro pútrido.
foreignData.name: Muriçoca Avara
foreignData.text: O número máximo permitido de cards na mão de cada oponente é reduzido em um.

foreignData.flavorText: 鼠人的昆虫祭师喜好离群索居；因为其浓重体臭，其它鼠人对此大表欢迎。
foreignData.name: 蚋虫守财奴
foreignData.text: 每位对手的手牌上限减少一张。

name: Gnat Miser
originalText: Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by one.

rulings.text: If multiple effects modify a player’s hand size, apply them in timestamp order. For example, if you put Cursed Rack (an artifact that sets a chosen player’s maximum hand size to four) onto the battlefield choosing your opponent and then put Gnat Miser onto the battlefield, your opponent will have a maximum hand size of three. However, if those permanents entered the battlefield in the opposite order, your opponent’s maximum hand size would be four.

text: Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by one.
